## R Markdown

```{r}
# Load acoustic data
new_acoustic <- read.csv("acoustic-ready.csv")

# Rename column headers
colnames(new_acoustic)[colnames(new_acoustic) == "SpeciesName"] <- "Species Name"
colnames(new_acoustic)[colnames(new_acoustic) == "duration"] <- "Duration"
new_acoustic

# Aggregate data
agg <- new_acoustic %>% group_by(line, station, Year, Season, `Species Name`)  %>%
                    summarise("Duration (Hours)" = sum(Duration))
agg <- na.omit(agg)
agg

#make csv file
write.csv(agg, "acoustic-det-marker.csv", row.names = FALSE)
```
